0.85
Réimplémentée à partir de CommonGLPI. Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :
cleanDates() cleanDatesPlanning PlanningcleanDates
static cleanDates (array $params = [] )[static]
Clean timezone information from dates fields, as fullcalendar doesn't support easily timezones, let's consider it sends raw dates (remove timezone suffix), we will manage timezone directy on database see https://fullcalendar.io/docs/timeZone
Depuis
9.5
Paramètres
array$params
parameters send by fullcalendar
Renvoie
array cleaned $params

static cloneEvent (array $event = [] )[static]
Clone an event
Depuis
9.5
Paramètres
array$event
the event to clone
Renvoie
mixed the id (integer) or false if it failed
colorFilter() colorFilterPlanning PlanningcolorFilter
static colorFilter ( $options = [] )[static]
change color for selected line of $_SESSION['glpi_plannings']
Depuis
9.1
Paramètres
array$options,
should contains :
type : event type, can be event_filter, user, group or group_users
parent : in case of type=users_group, must contains the id of the group
name : contains a string with type and id concatened with a '_' char (ex user_41).
color : rgb color (preceded by '#'' char)
Renvoie
void
constructEventsArraySingleLine() constructEventsArraySingleLinePlanning PlanningconstructEventsArraySingleLine
static constructEventsArraySingleLine ( $actor, $params = [] , & $raw_events = [] , & $not_planned = [] )[static]
construct a single line for self::constructEventsArray() Recursively called to construct $raw_events param.
Depuis
9.1
Paramètres
string$actor,
a type and id concaneted separated by '_' char, ex 'user_41'
array$params,
must contains this keys :
display: boolean for pass or not the consstruction of this line (a group of users can be displayed but its users not).
type: event type, can be event_filter, user, group or group_users
who: integer for identify user
whogroup: integer for identify group
color: string with rgb color for event's foreground color.
event_type_color : string with rgb color for event's foreground color.
array$raw_events,
(passed by reference) the events array in construction
array$not_planned
(passed by references) not planned events array in construction
Renvoie

Paramètres

position of the item in the time block (in, through, begin or end) (default '')
$complete

initSessionForCurrentUser() initSessionForCurrentUserPlanning PlanninginitSessionForCurrentUser
static initSessionForCurrentUser ( )[static]
Init $_SESSION['glpi_plannings'] var with thses keys :
'filters' : type of planning available (ChangeTask, Reminder, etc)
'plannings' : all plannings definided for current user.
If currently logged user, has no plannings or filter, this function wiil init them
Also manage color index in $_SESSION['glpi_plannings_color_index']
Renvoie

Display form after selecting date range in planning

begin : start of selection range. (should be an ISO_8601 date, but could be anything wo can be parsed by strtotime)
end : end of selection range. (should be an ISO_8601 date, but could be anything wo can be parsed by strtotime)

should contains :

updateEventTimes() updateEventTimesPlanning PlanningupdateEventTimes
static updateEventTimes ( $params = [] )[static]
Change dates of a selected event. Called from a drag&drop in planning
Depuis
9.1
Paramètres
array$options,
must contains this keys :
items_id : integer to identify items
itemtype : string to identify items
begin : planning start . (should be an ISO_8601 date, but could be anything wo can be parsed by strtotime)
end : planning end . (should be an ISO_8601 date, but could be anything wo can be parsed by strtotime)
Renvoie
bool
